flawed_nl_solution:
She has 240 minutes to write because 4 x 60 = <<4*60=240>>240
She will write 2400 words because 240 x 10 = <<240*10=2400>>2400
She will earn $240 for the words because 2400 x 0.1 = <<2400*0.1=240>>240
She will earn $108 from the articles because 3 x 60 = <<3*60=108>>108
She will earn $348 in total because 240 + 108 = <<240+108=348>>348
She will average $87 an hour because 348 / 4 = <<348/4=87>>87
#### 87

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 108. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
